metadata.title: CVE-2018-5818 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
An error within the "parse_rollei()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp)within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 can be exploited to trigger aninfinite loop.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5818` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.2-2
libraw20 - 0.19.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.2-2').
darktable package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
